name: Diamond Hunt (itch)
description:
A fun free platformer game where you collect as many diamonds as possible, and discover secret areas. Contains 7 difficult levels, requires skills, reflexes, and practice! New content, fixes and new features will be added in updates!

Current Version : 1.0.8 Updated on : 02-May-2018

Sound Resources:

Bfxr

Music

Made by me, using FamiTracker

You need to install the Java Runtime environment 1.7 or above to be able to run it Install it from this link: (Choose windows x64 offline)

http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jre8-downloads-2133155.html
